snippet: The pianist Andras Schiff postponed a performance in Maryland after the piano he uses had already made the trip. As a result, the instrument, which would otherwise have been trapped in Steinway Hall in an area closed by Hurricane Sandy, was available...
abstract: The pianist Andras Schiff postponed a performance in Maryland after the piano he uses had already made the trip. As a result, the instrument, which would otherwise have been trapped in Steinway Hall in an area closed by Hurricane Sandy, was available for a second New York recital.
